title: Scripting/ Hacking Accusation
body:
So i got banned on the oce servers under the name of Wabs and i would never script/hack because i think it is pathetic (i didnt script) and to my knowledge nothing has been done about it to fix the situation 

Riot, if you're not going unban me ( I HAVE NO IDEA WHY YOU DID IN THE FIRST PLACE SEEING AS I DIDNT SCRIPT) then at least send me an email so we can talk more about the situation 

my email: [REMOVED]

thank you ~ wabs

replies.body:
Please don't post personal information on boards. For this reason I have removed the eamil from the post. If you wish to contact Riot you can submit a support ticket here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

As for your suspension, has your account ever been shared with anyone else for any reason? Most commonly these cases come up when an account has been shared for the purposes of MMR boosting, and the booster has used scripts on the account.

Either way, Player Support will be able to tell you exactly why you were banned, just be aware that it may take a couple days for them to get back to you as they are very busy atm.
